snippet: Markets fell on Monday after reports of slowdowns in consumer and producer prices.
abstract: Weaker demand for Chinese products at home and abroad is putting downward pressure on prices; consumer prices fell 0.6 percent in June from May; mainland China stock markets fall on news.
lead_paragraph: Markets fell on Monday after reports of slowdowns in consumer and producer prices.

headline.seo: In China, Price Drops Spur Talk of Deflation
headline.main: Price Data Suggest Specter of Deflation in China
headline.print_headline: In China, Price Drops Spur Talk of Deflation
